name: Broomstick Productions
overview:
Have you had to deal with a bored kid in the car or plane? An upset child at a security check? Or a overactive toddler while you’re at home trying to cook?

Then you know exactly what we’re talking about — an app that keeps kids happy and interested is an absolute blessing, especially if they’re learning while they play! Meet Heckerty™, our zany, 409-year-old, upside-down-on-her-broomstick, green-faced witch. Happy, hilarious, helpful - our Heckerty app enchants and educates kids everywhere.

The secret? A proven, successful series of children stories, created and brought to life by one of Britain’s most internationally successful storytellers for many of the world’s most famous children.

And now, for the first time, Heckerty’s stories are available for your child — as an app designed for your iOS, Android or Kindle Fire device — so Meet Heckerty! We’ve taken these wonderful stories, and added a team of skilled actors, musicians, visual artists, technical wizards and production experts.

In Meet Heckerty we’ve merged the quality of traditional English storytelling with top 21st century technology and creative talent to create a story your kids will love and play for hours on end.

The result is truly magical! See for yourself. Follow Heckerty and her cat Zanzibar™ to magical places with stories, play, animations and adventures. Your kids will love her!

Additional Heckerty stories will be posted soon, along with Heckerty’s Cauldron Cookbook™, coloring books and a variety of other Heckerty products.

Meet Heckerty is available now from the Apple, Google and Amazon app stores.

funding_rounds.source_description: Hubble Bubble Toil and Trouble. Heckerty is here!
